entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 6.
